sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'movie',
	truncate:true) ~> sink1
